fields.description:
select
    > a.col1,
    > a.col2,
    > a.col3,
    > a.col4
    > from
    > tab1 a
    > inner join
    > (
    > select
    > max(x) as x
    > from
    > tab1
    > where
    > x < 20130327
    > ) r
    > on
    > a.x = r.x
    > where
    > a.col1 = 'F'
    > and a.col3 in ('A', 'S', 'G');
